lyrics:
9 contributorsfollow through lyricsverse 1
oh this is the start of something good
dont you agree
i havent felt like this in so many moons
you know what i mean

prechorus 1
and we can build through this destruction
as we are standing on our feet

chorus
so since you wanna be with me
youll have to follow through
with every word you say
and i all i really want is you
you to stick around
ill see you every day
but you have to follow through
you have to follow through

verse 2
these reeling emotions they just keep me alive
they keep me in tune
oh look what im holding here in my fire
this is for you
see gavin degraw liveget tickets as low as 53you might also likeprechorus 2
am i too obvious to preach it
youre so hypnotic on my heart

youll have to follow through
with every word you say
and i all i really want is you
you to stick around
ill see you every day

thats ever been
